title: Sekuhara Koukuu 801-bin: Okyaku-sama, Chaku to Belt wo Oshime Kudasai
original_name: セクハラ航空 801 便~お客様、チャックとベルトをお閉めください~
sinopse: "Attention please! Thank you very much for flying with us today. Currently, we are trying a new method of doing away with sexual harassment... me! I'm a super buff cabin attendant & I will permit no sexual harassment on board!" Dressed in a miniskirt and a thong, this loyal employee sets his sights on a maniacal peeping pervert! But to his surprise... he's exactly what this nutcase was after! As the airplane escalates, so does his forced service, until he's totally ready for liftoff!
